title: Portfolio
text:
Academic Projects

Childhood Obesity Prediction: Research in partnership with CIDACS and UFMG focused on statistical modeling.
Bias Correction: Identification and correction of gender biases in Word Embeddings.



Experiences

People Analytics - green4T: Development of interactive reports in Power BI.

title: Sof Aguiar
text:
Welcome to my Portfolio!
I am Sof, a Statistics graduate from UFMG. I have experience in data visualization, spatial analysis and statistical modeling, focusing on applications in public health. Currently, I am studying machine learning methods, such as deep learning and transfer learning.
Feel free to explore my page, where you can find my experience, publications and tutorials to R programming.

© 2025 Sofia Aguiar

title: Sofia Aguiar - Portfolio
text:
My goal is to apply advanced data analysis techniques to solve public health challenges, especially in epidemiology.
